wikipedia_page.main: Edward Andrew George Perry (born 30 April 1934) was a Scottish football outside forward who played in the Scottish League for Queen's Park and Raith Rovers. He was capped by Scotland at amateur level.

response: *Edward Perry Warren (1860–1928), American art collector and author
*Edward Perry (industrialist) (1800–1869), English industrialist and twice mayor of Wolverhampton
*George Edward Perry, known as Ted, English classical record producer, founder of Hyperion Records
